summary:
• Four years providing clinical services in resource limited settings in DR Congo and Mozambique, Africa;  the experience assisted with my growth as a reality-based public health professional, 

• Experience with different non-governmental organizations, each with a specific approach for addressing health needs of their target populations,

• Supervisory experience in both program administration as well as team management,

• Masters Degree in Public Health,

• Creative writing, good reporting and communication skills, at community, organization and government levels,

• Fluent in English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.
